sentence.Network_en: Recession has simply accelerated changes that have been reshaping the industry anyway.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济萧条只不过加速了原本就在改变行业状况的变化。

sentence.Network_en: Their mission is simply to scout out places where helicopters can land.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的任务只是找到能够让直升机着陆的地方。

sentence.Network_en: You simply can't get a ticket through official channels.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过官方渠道是压根儿搞不到票的.

means.word_mean: 只有,纯粹地,完全地,绝对地,肯定地
明显地,清楚地,显而易见地
诚实地,质朴地,天真地,自然地

entry.tran: 简单地;只不过;仅仅;纯粹
entry.def: You use simply to emphasize that something consists of only one thing, happens for only one reason, or is done in only one way.

example.ex: The table is simply a chipboard circle on a base...
example.tran: 这张桌子只不过是在底座上安了一块圆形刨花板。

example.ex: Most of the damage that's occurred was simply because of fallen trees...
example.tran: 目前大部分损坏都是因为倒下的树木造成的。

entry.def: You use simply to emphasize what you are saying.

example.ex: This sort of increase simply cannot be justified...
example.tran: 这种增长根本就不合理。

example.ex: So many of these questions simply don't have answers...
example.tran: 这些问题有很多根本就没有答案。

sentences.sentence: "it is simply a matter of time"

means.word_mean: 3. in a simple manner; without extravagance or embellishment;

auth_sentence.content: The law is simply too weak to prevent it.
auth_sentence.res_content: The law is simply too weak to prevent it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The law is simply too weak to prevent it.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, physicists simply camped outside the auditorium instead.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, physicists simply camped outside the auditorium instead.

auth_sentence.content: The market simply didn't see this before me!

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fold,表示"重叠,重复"; 2. 折; 3. 弯

stems_affixes.value_cn: 简单地, 完全, 简直, 仅仅
stems_affixes.word_buile: simple[adj.简单的, 简易的, 朴素的]+ly表副词→adv.简单地, 完全, 简直, 仅仅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 开发, 开采, 剥削
stems_affixes.word_buile: exploit[v.开拓,开发,开采 v.使用]+ation表名词→n.开发, 开采, 剥削

Sentence.sentence: According to Facebook's vice-president Elliot Schrage, the company is simply making changes to improve its service, and if people don't share information They have a "less satisfying experience".
When I look at my friendship with Joe, I wonder how many people I've known whom I never disliked, but simply didn't take the time to get to know.
These changing life styles are responsible for the increasing number of people who must rush meals or sometimes simply go without them
The problem is that the statistics aren't an objective measure of reality; they are simply a best approximation.
And at the vast majority of places, it is simply not a big variable in the college's decision-making process
Some things simply can't be measured.

means.word_mean: 简单地; 简易地; 朴素地

sentences.en: To put it simply, the new proposals mean that the average worker will be about 10% better paid.
sentences.cn: 简单地说, 新建议意味着一个普通工人的工资将增加10%。

sentences.en: I have never met our new neighbours; I simply know them by sight.
sentences.cn: 我从未接触过我们的新邻居, 只见过面。

sentences.en: What we need is simply money, money and money.
sentences.cn: 我们所需的仅仅是钱而已。

sentences.en: The drink consists simply of fresh oranges.
I don't like driving; I do it simply because I have to get to work each day.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢开车, 只是因为我每天必须开车上班。

means.word_mean: 〈非正〉实在, 简直, 非常

sentences.en: My brother's English pronunciation is simply terrible.
sentences.cn: 我兄弟的英语发音实在糟透了。

sentences.en: It is simply ridiculous to attempt such a thing.
sentences.cn: 试图干这种事, 简直可笑。

sentences.en: The meat was so tough that I simply couldn't get it down.
sentences.cn: 这肉太老了, 我简直咽不下去。

jushi.english: I do it simply for money.
jushi.chinese: 我做这件事只不过是为了那笔钱。

jushi.english: To put it simply, the new proposals mean that the average worker will be about 10% better off.
jushi.chinese: 简单地说,新的建议意味着一个普通工人的工资增加10%。

jushi.english: I'm afraid you're simply painting the lily; the picture is good enough as it is.
jushi.chinese: 我看你这样做简直是多余的,这幅画本来已经够好了。
